choices: You go to the kitchen to eat breakfast.
You sit on the couch to ask if you can watch tv.
1.content: You wake up at 10:45 a.m. to your brother playing loud video games. You decide to hop up and get dressed. In your closet is a large variety of clothes and shoes. You decide to put on a white tanktop and a pair of sweats, along with a pair of sandles to expose your perfectly filed bare toenails. You walk into the living room and find Eren is playing on his PS4.
1.title: Angelicas reign

choices: teach him a lesson with your feet
take your phone back and leave
11.content: Your stomach rumbles. You decide to ignore the indecent sounds coming from your brother's game. You walk into the kitchen to grab some breakfast. You decide on some cereal since you were also thirsty and you could drink the milk afterwards. Once you finish the cereal you wash your bowl and spoon, as you do so Dakota calls you, "Angelica, will you come here real quick?" You walk into his room and say "Hey, what's up?" He begs that you help him by reaching on top of his dresser, which he can't reach, and grab his air-soft gun so that he can go and play in the yard with it. As you reach up on the tips of your toes, you realize your phone is on his bed. You see the corner of your phone poking out from under his pillow. He notices you and tries to sit on the pillow, hoping you didn't notice. You get off the tips of your toes and walk over to the pillow. "There's nothing over here, you don't have to come over here..." you push him over and lift the pillow. The display is on and it shows the messages between you and your best friend. "What the Hell are you doing with my phone!?!?" He blushes but stays silent. You think of two ways you can handle this, you decide to...
11.title: You go to the kitchen to eat breakfast.

choices: corrupt him
smile and walk away
111.content: "I...i'm sorry I didn't..." You interrupt him " No excuses, i'm getting payback." You take his phone. " Hey give me my phone ba...umph" You push him onto the floor. You drag him to the side of the bed and you sit on the bed, your feet on both sides of his head. You show him his phone screen with a password on it, "Tell me the password." you demand, "No, i'm not gonna give you the password." You plant your feet on his face, he begins to squirm as your soft soles press against his nose, "open wide..." you begin to jam your toes into his mouth but he keeps it locked shut. You get on the camera on his phone since his iphone has that functionality where you can access camera even if his screen is locked. You take a picture of your feet on his face. Just before you pry his mouth open to slip your feet into his mouth, he yells "OK OK OK I'LL TELL YOU!" you take your toes away, "The password is I love Katy" You giggle and he blushes. Once on his phone, you go to his instagram, which he has 274 followers on, and post his picture, you then change his password to I love Angel's feet. You show him his new post and lock his phone. He gasps and calls you a bitch.
111.title: teach him a lesson with your feet

choices: Lead your other brother into a trap to become a Guinea Pig.
Corrupt your dad
Have him continue his worship.
1111.content: "You need to be more respective of your big sister boy." You grab his hair and yank him to a sitting position. You shove your toes in his mouth. This time with the increase of pressure you get your toes into his mouth. He starts screaming but a he begins to calm down like he took morphine. He begins sucking your toes. You don't know what's going on. This is supposed to be punishment you thought. You pull your toes out of his mouth. His jaw slacks and he stares off into space. You wave your hand in front of his face. His eyes remain motionless. "Are you ok?" You ask him. "Yess, I love feeeettt." he drones. You smirk, you've always had a foot fetish, you also always had a fascination for your own feet. You believe everyone should love them. An idea comes to mind. "Smell my feet." you command your slave you once called brother. "Yesss Angelica" he replies, monotone. "That's Goddess to you." "Yesss Goddess" his nose presses against your wet toes and a cool breeze is felt going through your toes toward his nostrils. An evil smirk comes across you face...
1111.title: corrupt him

choices: See how he reacts to the smell of your bare feet.
Give him small tastes periodically.
See what your socks and shoes can do.
11111.content: This is a strange new ability you just discovered. One minute your brother calls you a bitch. Next thing you know he gets a taste of your feet and is a mindless drone. You decide you would like a guinea pig, and no one better than the annoying brother in the living room. "Go have your brother come here." You hand him the rope. "Once he is in, lock the door and tie him up." Your brother drones "Yes Goddess. " you add in "Oh, and act more natural. We don't want him to be freaked out. Do we?" Your brother shakes his head. He looks at you and smiles, "you're right. I'll go and get him...sis." He winks. He goes into the living room to get him and you sit in his chair and wait. A few mins later Eren walks in. "So what game are we...: " Eren looks at you. You smile greedily. Dakota locks the door and tackles him. Soon Eren is tied up. At your mercy. "What are you two doing? Is this a sick joke or something? I don't like it. " He's now at your full mercy. You decide to...
11111.title: Lead your other brother into a trap to become a...

choices: enslave dad first
enslave mom first
111111.content:
"Let's see how he reacts to my foot smell" said Angelica slowly removing her sandals and revealing her beautiful feet.

"Sis, what's up? Why am I tied up? And why our brother is acting strange?" said Eren worried.

"That's because he is now my loyal footslave and will do anything I ask him to do, right my little bro?" Said Angelica petting her brother's head with her right foot.

"Yes mistress, I only live to serve you and your amazing feet. From now on I'll help you to enslave everyone and conquer this world... that's because... I... think you should dominate every man and woman with your feet, and become the real goddess you are..." said Dakota blushing.

"W...what.. brother, why are you saying that? Angelica is our sis, now free me and.... "

"Shut up Eren, you're going to be my slave just like Dakota, I just discovered the power of my feet and I will use them to become a real goddess and enslave everyone, ahahaha, so you're the next one!"

And then turning to her enslaved brother she said "You are a very good slave Dakota, if you keep obeying me, I will let you sniff and suck my feet, and also drink my sweat forever.... my aroma will keep you enslaved forever, ahahahah. So now, help me in making Eren my slave, I want to see the real power of my feet, perhaps I'm going to make him smell my feet"

"Yes mistress Angelica" said his brother and after grabbing his brother arms, he turned his brother's head in direction of Angelica beautiful feet.

"N...no, stop this... I don't wanna be your slave" said Eren struggling. "Oh, don't worry bro, our sister will take always care of us, just take in the smell of her beautiful feet and let yourself be enslaved" said Dakota whispering in his ears.

Seeing that scene Angelica couldn't help but laugh "Ahahaha, well said Dakota, I will be a very good mistress, I promise... so now let's begin"

After she said that words Angelica moved her right foot forward trying to make contact with Eren's nose, while Dakota tried hard to make him stay still.
"Ugh...n...no, I... don't wanna.. mum.... help...." and while trying to yell, Dakota who had expected this behavior, took a piece of duct tape and closed his mouth.
"Mistress, now he can only breath, through his nose" said Dakota smiling.
"You are a very good slave, you know? " reply Angelica.
"Now you cannot yell or excape, so prepare yourself" and so Angelica put finally her foot on his brother's nose. He tried to resist initially, but he wanted to breathe so badly, so in the end he took a little sniff...
"Ugh... this smell so bad....her foot is stinky and sweaty, I cannot take in anymore...."

However after his third breath his struggling became less and less vigorous and started to really sniff in the stinky foot air.
"Sniff....snifff.....sniff....I don't know why, but this smell is so good...snifff....my sister...no....my goddess have lovely feet...I have to obey her.... I want to become her footslave forever, sniff...sniff....thank you Angelica, you showed me the way"

"Hey Dakota, he seems to be enjoying my feet very much, don't you think?"
"Yes mistress, now he is really your foot slave, I think we can remove the duct tape"
"Ok, slave, let's remove it" said Angelica smirking.

After removing the duct tape, Angelica asked him: "So... now slave, who is your goddess, your mistress, your princess and your only reason to live?
"Mmm....you are mistress, I will be your slave for the rest of my life, please, let me sniff and worship your feet forever... I will obey every your command, and helping you enslave everyone" said Eren now completely helpless and enslaved to her mistress feet.

"I don't know slave if I should let you have the honor of smelling and licking my perfect feet, ahahahah, just a moment ago you were disgusted with the smell and taste of my stinky feet, ihihihi"
"I...I'm sorry mistress, I was not aware of their beauty, thanks to you finally I understood my place in life, to only serve and worship you, to long for your feet and drink your sweat. Please forgive me, I...I will help you in showing the right path to anyone who doesn't still see it, so that finally your reign as the rightful owner of this world will begin"

Angelica was delighted by these words, her brothers were worshipping her as a goddess, but she knew that they were right. She had to be the owner of this world and everyone should kneel to her feet.
"I think you are right Eren, you and Dakota will help me enslaving the world, I will own everything and everyone, ahahahah. I cannot believe that the smell and sweat of my feet is so powerful, I should make a potion out of it and use to enslave everyone. You are going to help me find someone who can make it, ok?"
"Yes mistress" said the two brothers at the unison.

"Now slaves it's time to enslave our parents, we only have to decide the first one to enslave.... as for the plan, is simple; I will make my feet sweating very much in my socks and shoes, so that my smell will be highly hypnotic and addicting, then you will find a way to make mom or dad sedate and then after that you will tie him or her. The rest is up to me, ahahahah. I will make them smell my beautiful feet and after that they will beg me to be my slaves forever just like you, ihihihi."

"All clear, slaves?"
"Yes princess Angelica"

Very well we will begin with....
111111.title: See how he reacts to the smell of your bare feet.

choices: Shove your toes in your mouth.
Show your best friend.
Give Dakota a reward
111112.content: You decide to give him small tastes of your feet. If the taste can corrupt Dakota's mind just by a few seconds of taste. I wonder what even smaller amounts of taste might do. "Open his mouth, slave." You order Dakota. "Open my mouth, what? Why are you aaahhh.." Dakota jams his fist into the side of his mouth. Still leaving plenty of room for your plans. You raise your foot and taunt Eren by waving your foot at him. Saying you're going to do something to him that involves your feet. You run your tongue quickly across his tongue. He Jerks his head. Nothing much happens. A few moments later you do it again. Again nothing. A few more times of doing it. His face isnred and he's sweating. "Take your mouth out slave." He takes his hand out. "How do you feel, Eren?" His mouth opens and only soft moans can come out. You wave your foot over his head. His eyes track it but body stays still. He's paralized. You put him on the bed and decide
111112.title: Give him small tastes periodically.

choices: Wait until you can come out.
Go teach your brother a lesson.
12.content:
You sit on the seat and look at your brother, "Care if i watch tv?"
"No I'm not done with it" he answered.
Feeling angered you bring up the fact that he even some you up with it. You two then get into a fight. It's louder than the games that originally woke you up.
Your dad walks in. "You both go to you're room." You protest "But dad..." "Now! " he demands.
You both obey your dad and go to your rooms.
12.title: You sit on the couch to ask if you can watch tv.

choices: You rush to his room
You don't care,  he won't say anything.
122.content: You wait for a minute until you hear your dad close his door. Once you hear the creek of the door shutting you go and open your brother's room. He's playing on his PC! You shut the door and he turns around. You lock the door and smirk. "I'm going to teach you what real punishment is. "What do you mean? " You grab rope hanging from your brother's closet, he uses the rope to climb evewhen he plays with friends. You throw him to the ground and tie him up. He starts screaming. You cover his mouth with one hand and stick the index finger of your other hand in your mouth. You then put it in his ear. You tell him you'll keep doing it unless he shuts up. He quiets and you set him sitting back against the wall. You remove your sandles. "Remember, don't scream..." You plant your feet on his face. He shakes head. Wearing himself out and needing to breathe more. Soon you lick your toes and stuff them into his mouth. You untie him. "You ever mention this I'll show you what it's like after gym. " you whisper as you walk out you notice the camera to the pc is on and skype is running. You click on it to see your other brother watching in horror.
122.title: Go teach your brother a lesson.

choices: Give him the save punishment
Tell him to keep his mouth shut,  or else.
1221.content: You get up and rush into his room. The door slams but you catch it before it shuts. Your brother backs up, scared. You smile and decide to
1221.title: You rush to his room

info.brief_description: Angelica descovers new powers with her... feet!
info.description:
Your name is Angelica, you're 16 and in your family you have mom (Sarah), dad(Triston), two brothers, (Eren and Dakota ), and a dog, Neptune.

Sarah: She has brown hair and brown eyes. A little chubby.

Triston: Your dad has black hair and brown eyes. He's farely muscular and stands at 6 ft. 2".

Neptune: your family pet. She is a Husky, about 1 year old. Other than potty training, the dog isn't trained.
